name: The Legend of McRollabe
description: Play as the legendary hand of justice, Sheriff McRollabe, as you take on the ruthless bandits who robbed the local bank, and save the townsfolk held hostage. On the trail of the bandits, be sure to recover the gold they stole and beware of the Wild West's dangerous obstacles. Good luck Sheriff, and may justice be swifter than the fastest rattlesnake!
